Judul: On the `multiple viewpoint' theory of early modern art.
Abstrak: Examines the validity of the multiple viewpoint theory of cubism. Focus on the cubist art from Paul Cezanne; Explanations for the strangeness of Cezanne's drawing style; Shifting viewpoints in Cezanne.
Sumber: Journal of Aesthetics & Art Criticism. Spring95, Vol. 53 Issue 2, p129. 9p
